channel.title: Smine Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 0.3.1( Add a popup menu on right bottom bar. Add "send to playlist:" in context menu.
item.description:
• Add a popup menu "switch to playlist:" if click on right bottom bar.
  • Add "send to playlist:" in context menu.
  • Fix bugs when "delete track items".
